title: FromBACnetString (Function)
text:
FUNCTION FromBACnetString : BOOL
Returns a WSTRING corresponding to the given IEC_BACNET_STRING. Only UTF-8 and ISO 8859-1 BACnet-String supported right now.

rows.Name: bacString
rows.Comment:
The BACnet string to convert to a WSTRING
(with respect to the given string type in the BACnet string).
